body.p: How to bring critical news to the user are the subject of GLEP 42. Gentoo in use at Brenntag Nordic is covered in an interview with Jacob Lindberg. Also, there will be another GeCHI conference in Italy. And the GentooJP-crowd gives once again a sightseeing-tour through Tokyo for a foreign Gentoo-Dev. Read further in this week's GWN!
